message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $20,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
Alice, $20,000 is way out of my price range. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $12,000. What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $12,000 is quite a bit below what I had in mind.  Could you do $17,000? It's a very fair price considering the value this product brings.
Alice, I understand you need a good price, but $17,000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $14,000.  This is a fair price for both of us, and we can finalize the deal.
